Module edu.ntnu.idatt1002.sysdev_k1_05_ets
Package edu.ntnu.idatt1002.sysdev_k1_05_ets.tournament

Class Tournament

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.sysdev_k1_05_ets.tournament.Tournament
public class Tournament extends Object
Tournament represents all the attributes and variables that makes up a tournament It is used to store tournament information in object, after reading for file.

  • Constructor Details

    • Tournament

      public Tournament(String tournamentName)
      The first constructor. It takes the tournament name and throws an exception if it is null/empty
      Parameters:
      tournamentName - the name of the tournament

    • Tournament

      public Tournament(String status, String tournamentName, String tournamentHost, LocalDate date, LocalTime time, String description, String game, String platform, String tournamentType, int numberOfTeams, int prizePool, String prizePoolCurrency, int entranceFee, String entranceFeeCurrency)
      The second constructor. It throws an exception if any of the parameters have illegal value i.e. "null".
      Parameters:
      status - status of the tournament
      tournamentName - name of the tournament
      tournamentHost - host of the tournament
      date - date of the tournament
      time - time of the tournament
      description - description of the tournament
      game - game to be played
      platform - platform to be played on
      tournamentType - type of tournament
      numberOfTeams - number of teams
      prizePool - prize pool of the tournament
      prizePoolCurrency - currency of the prize pool
      entranceFee - entrance fee of the tournament
      entranceFeeCurrency - currency of the entrance fee

    • Tournament

      public Tournament(String status, String tournamentName, String tournamentHost, LocalDate date, LocalTime time, String description, String game, String platform, String tournamentType, int numberOfTeams, int prizePool, String prizePoolCurrency, int entranceFee, String entranceFeeCurrency, ArrayList<Team> teams)
      The third constructor. Throws exceptions at same values as the second constructor. Also throws exception at illegal values when instantiating teams.
      Parameters:
      status - status of the tournament
      tournamentName - name of the tournament
      tournamentHost - host of the tournament
      date - date of the tournament
      time - time of the tournament
      description - description of the tournament
      game - game to be played
      platform - platform to be played on
      tournamentType - type of tournament
      numberOfTeams - number of teams
      prizePool - prize pool of the tournament
      prizePoolCurrency - currency of the prize pool
      entranceFee - entrance fee of the tournament
      entranceFeeCurrency - currency of the entrance fee
      teams - teams participating in the tournament

    • getFirstPlace

      public Team getFirstPlace()
      Method for fetching first place of tournament, only if finished
      Returns:
      winner of the final match, which is the first place of the tournament

    • getSecondPlace

      public Team getSecondPlace()
      Method for fetching second place of a tournament, only if finished
      Returns:
      loser of the final match, which is the second place of the tournament
